summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of The Alley in Block 50, Replat of Pontius' 2nd Addition, being the alley between East Howell Street and East Denny Way, from Boylston Avenue to the north and south alley in said block; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 14236 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
